fr.sii.ogham.core.service

Interface MessagingService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CleanableMessagingService, EverySupportingMessagingService, WrapExceptionMessagingService

    public interface MessagingService
    Interface that declares the contract for using the messaging system. The contract is really simple. Just provide a message, call send(Message) and the message will be sent. The service internally delegates to a MessageSender.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
    See Also:
    MessageSender, Message

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void send(Message message)
      Sends the message.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(Message message)
   throws MessagingException
        Sends the message. The message can be anything with any content and that must be delivered to something or someone.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        Throws:
        MessagingException - when the message couldn't be sent
